messages.message:
Hi Team,

Is there a way to turn off the OCR step first, without it running automatically?

I had a call with client NWM last week. They didn’t say it outright, but implied we charge for everything. If this OCR step can be turned off, then they could just upload the file directly.

cc: @jade.kelly @Alex Sgueglia

1: Do we charge for the OCR step?
2. After the file is OCR’d, it automatically runs the field that triggers an LLM call.
@Victor Zeng @Gaurav Saini do you know  Do we charge for the OCR step?

1. i don't think we charge for digitization in Build projects - @ayesha.ali can you confirm?
2. this is correct - @Jet is there a question here?
1. yep we don't charge for digitization
for #2,I’m wondering if this can be turned off to not run automatically.
Note that under the new pricing, build will be changing to per page uploaded with unlimited fields
I’m not sure what that means. Could you provide an example?

So, if a customer uploads a file(will OCR automatically) , regardless of whether the upload is successful or fails, they’ll still be charged even if there are no fields in the project, right?

If a file has 10 pages, they get charged 10 pages.

> for #2,I’m wondering if this can be turned off to not run automatically.
this is currently not possible
It should be only successful upload. cc @Josh Rad

~@Victor Zeng i believe we're not changing the actions we charge for, right?~
• ~in other words, we'll still charge for running classification and for running fields~
    ◦ ~but not for digitization~
• ~it's just that the pricing model for these charges will change~
    ◦ ~when running classification, we will charge based on the number of pages in the document~
    ◦ ~same for running fields~
        ▪︎ ~note that we will no longer be charging for fields individually~
fyi @Jet, we are talking about this initiative https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4667
For app runs, no. But for build, we are

@Serena can you clarify your message above? In the new pricing, we'll charge as follows:

• Will be charged per-page uploaded while creating Automate Projects (Build).
• Will be charged per-page processed for Automate App Runs.
• Will be charged per-page processed for Deployment App Runs.
• Will not be charged for any other actions taken inside of Automate product surface areas. This means customers will not be charged for any of the following:
    ◦ Any type of field configuration (includes extraction, document reasoning, visual reasoning, derived, or custom functions).
    ◦ Classification.
I got a little confused by this note:
`in other words, we'll still charge for running classification and for running fields`

Wouldn’t people exploit this by compressing 100 pages of text into a single page and creating an “unlimited” field, effectively turning our AIHub into a middleman between the call and the OpenAI endpoint, since OpenAI charges per token?
ok i misunderstood the desired behavior for https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4667
